.b-schedulerheader.title: Make changes to the columns
.b-schedulerheader.content: Resize, reorder or hide certain columns, change zoom level, etc. Gantt will look same after reload

[data-ref=autoSaveCheckbox].title: Save state automatically
[data-ref=autoSaveCheckbox].content: Changes are stored automatically and applied immediately after reload. Uncheck to stop syncing state changes

[data-ref=resetButton].title: Reset app state
[data-ref=resetButton].content: Discard user changes to app default
